questions.question: What is a genetic mutation?
options: A change in the sequence of DNA
The passing of traits from parent to offspring
questions.answer: A change in the sequence of DNA

questions.question: Which of the following can cause genetic mutations?
What is a point mutation?
options: A mutation affecting a single nucleotide
A mutation affecting a large segment of a chromosome
A mutation that causes the loss of a chromosome
A mutation that duplicates a chromosome
questions.answer: A mutation affecting a single nucleotide
